## Conclusion
All validation complete. System ready for production.

## Key Findings

### Strengths
1. Battle state machine robust under stress
2. Save/load system handles corruption gracefully
3. No memory leaks detected in extended battles
4. Thread safety maintained under concurrency
5. Regression tests confirm no previously fixed bugs returned

### Areas Monitored
1. Performance degradation over 100+ rounds (minimal)
2. Effect stacking limits (no exploits found)
3. Turn counter accuracy (no drift)
4. Cooldown reset between battles (working)

## Recommendations
1. Continue monitoring long-session performance
2. Add more concurrency tests as features expand
3. Maintain regression test suite with new bugs
4. Consider adding fuzz testing for save files
